page.title: 02TOMINTOUL HIGHLAND GAMES.
page.content: The Tomintoul Highland Games is the most thrilling day out of the locals' year.In the Games Park, a great ring is fenced out and different stalls are set up all around it.Inside the ring, the competitors gather.There are a lot of different events. Many girls and some boys go in for the Highland Dancing competitions. There are also Bagpiping competitions. For younger children there are races like the sack race and the potato and spoon race. For the big men or "Heavies", there are events such as throwing the hammer, tossing the weight and, the most important event, tossing the caber. In 1982, Geoff Capes came up to the Tomintoul Highland Games and was a great attraction. In 1985, the Tomintoul Highland Games will be 144 years old. On Tomnabat Hill there is the Hill
